Message.Msg: Also, the drop in implied volatility is higher in the options that are closer to expiring. For instance the July weekly 600 call actually lost money even though the call is in the money.

I bought some weekly calls at 600. Looking forward to a pop on Monday morning. I'm only going to hold these calls a couple days at most. I expect AAPL to run-up to earnings on Tues. 7/24, probably GOOG will also continue on it's run.

Message.Title: technical analysis for goog weekly chart
Message.Msg: A lot of stocks look like there about to roll over, but Goog looks like its gonna make a run at 760-780 area. Weird stuff.

Topic.Title: technical analysis for goog weekly chart

Message.Msg: If AAPL continues on their run-up to earnings, GOOG will also continue on their pop. Friday's volume was about twice the normal volume, plenty of buyers that will continue buying.
